name: Conductor's Top Hat
title: The Sound of Ancient Music: Conductor's Top Hat
desc: "The members then turned the notes into words and recorded their journey in a book.\nThis book, The Widsith as they called it, was still held tightly in the conductor's hands even after his death."
in_play_description: After you switch to the character to which this is attached: Discard the card with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost in your Hand and change 2 Elemental Dice into Omni Element, and spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time the character uses a Skill or plays a Talent. (Once per Round)
